author_blurb.en: Translated for SuttaCentral by Bhikkhu Sujato, 2018. Dedicated to the public domain via Creative Commons Zero (CC0). You are encouraged to copy, reproduce, adapt, alter, or otherwise make use of this translation in any way you wish. Attribution is appreciated but not legally required.

segments.pli: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhammā parisuddhā pariyodātā, nāññatra sugatavinayā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, these ten things are not purified and cleansed apart from the Holy One’s training.

segments.pli: Sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi, sammāñāṇaṃ, sammāvimutti—
segments.en: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.

segments.pli: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhammā parisuddhā pariyodātā, nāññatra sugatavinayā”ti.
segments.en: These ten things are not purified and cleansed apart from the Holy One’s training.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, these ten things are not purified and cleansed…
